description: Fixed couple of errors with drums and vocals and backing vocals to sound just like in original song. Everything else stayed the same.
title: Nothin But a Good Time

description: Changed tempo from 134 to 130 BPM and changed the drums pattern and fixed some errors and added vocals and backup vocals and for the drums I had to listen to the original song about 50 times to get it right. Guitars have stayed the same.
title: Nothin But a Good Time

description:
Drum track added. 
Please note: I have created an approximation of what happens on the original recording, as this arrangement needed some drums, but I am not a drummer, so this is not perfect.

I welcome any updates and improvements from other members of Songsterr who also play drums and know the drum parts to this song inside out.
title: Nothin But a Good Time
